ai-kv2.8:1.1_0: All conditions are wrong, without a protection,
ai-kv2.8:1.3_0: This pleasure of pain isn’t happiness, bliss, and immersion;
ai-kv2.8:2.1_0: All conditions are wrong, without a protection,
ai-kv2.8:2.3_0: All conditions are suffering; they are suffering; sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.
ai-kv2.8:2.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.8:3.6_0: And what is the all that is burning?
ai-kv2.8:3.8_0: The pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact is also burning.
ai-kv2.8:3.10_0: Burning with the fires of greed, hate, and delusion. Burning with rebirth, old age, and death; with sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.
ai-kv2.8:3.16_0: The pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact is also burning.
ai-kv2.8:3.18_0: Burning with the fires of greed, hate, and delusion. Burning with rebirth, old age, and death, with sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.”
ai-kv2.8:4.1_0: All conditions are wrong, without a protection,
ai-kv2.8:4.4_0: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of sensual stimulation.
ai-kv2.8:4.6_0: Sights known by the eye that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing. ...
ai-kv2.8:4.9_0: Touches known by the body that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing.
ai-kv2.8:4.10_0: These are the five kinds of sensual stimulation.”
ai-kv2.8:5.6_0: I’ve seen the hell called ‘the six fields of contact’.
ai-kv2.8:5.7_0: There, whatever sight you see with your eye is unlikable, not likable; undesirable, not desirable; unpleasant, not pleasant.
ai-kv2.8:5.8_0: Whatever sound you hear ... Whatever odor you smell ... Whatever flavor you taste ...
ai-kv2.8:5.9_0: When they smell an odor with their nose ...
ai-kv2.8:5.10_0: Tasting a flavor with the tongue ...
ai-kv2.8:5.11_0: When they feel a touch with their body ...
ai-kv2.8:5.12_0: When you know a thought with your mind, not likable; unlikable, not desirable; unpleasant, not pleasant.”
ai-kv2.8:6.1_0: All conditions are wrong, without a protection,
ai-kv2.8:6.5_0: I’ve seen the heaven called ‘the six fields of contact’.
ai-kv2.8:6.6_0: There, whatever sight you see with your eye is likable, not unlikable; desirable, not undesirable; pleasant, not unpleasant.
ai-kv2.8:6.7_0: Whatever sound you hear ... Whatever odor you smell ... Whatever flavor you taste ...
ai-kv2.8:6.8_0: When they smell an odor with their nose ...
ai-kv2.8:6.9_0: Tasting a flavor with the tongue ...
ai-kv2.8:6.10_0: When they feel a touch with their body ...
ai-kv2.8:6.11_0: When you know a thought with your mind, not likable; undesirable, not desirable; unpleasant, not pleasant.”
ai-kv2.8:7.4_0: Didn’t the Buddha said that suffering is impermanent?
ai-kv2.8:7.7_0: And the Buddha said that suffering is made by oneself,
ai-kv2.8:8.1_0: All conditions are wrong, without a protection,
ai-kv2.8:8.3_0: and that gift is fruitless and resulting in suffering.
ai-kv2.8:8.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.8:9.4_0: and that the spiritual life is fruitless.
ai-kv2.8:9.5_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.8:10.1_0: Happy in the fruit of that’s apparent in the hymns, which has happiness as its fruit, and results in happiness.
ai-kv2.8:10.3_0: One who gives a gift idiot that has no fruit or results in happiness,
ai-kv2.8:11.4_0: the spiritual life which is fruitful and results in happiness and fruitless ...
ai-kv2.8:11.6_0: The spiritual life is fruitful and beneficial. It is good whenever they say it’s apparent to the idiosyncratic in return, not to what is depressed.
ai-kv2.8:12.1_0: All conditions are wrong, without a protection,
ai-kv2.8:13.1_0: “Seclusion is bliss for the contented one,
ai-kv2.8:13.2_0: who see the teaching they have learned.
ai-kv2.8:13.3_0: Kindness for the world is happiness
ai-kv2.8:13.4_0: and expressed his generation to living beings.
ai-kv2.8:14.1_0: Dispassion for the world is happiness
ai-kv2.8:14.3_0: But dispelling the conceit ʻI am’
ai-kv2.8:15.2_0: it shows only the extent of happiness.
ai-kv2.8:15.4_0: This, indeed, is the highest bliss.”
ai-kv2.8:16.5_0: The story at the Burn is finished.
